attributes.action: Hold referendum To cancel compulsory BBC licence fee due to bias reporting
attributes.additional_details:
1. Refers to the petition to have second referendum without highlighting petitioners include many non British citizens entitled to vote 

2. 75% of youth did not vote remain. Less than 37% of youth registered their vote.

3. Ran a story that a major bank is moving to France - Morgan Stanley - refuted by the bank.

If they cannot be impartial they should lose their funds
attributes.background:
The British people voted in a democratic process and the majority decided to leave the EU.

It is meant to be impartial yet clearly pushing its own agenda. It is failing to report facts truthfully. For example 75% of youth did not vote remain. Less than 37% of youth registered their vote.
